testcase.classname: feature to test Records SignOff in Link
testcase.name: Validate All the fields in the Grid view in Records Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters username and password......................................passed And Clicks on login button..................................................passed Then User navigated to the home page........................................passed And User click on Link under Hamburger icon in webpage......................passed And User click on Record Under Hamburger in Link HomePage...................passed Then User verify all the fields in the Grid view Page.......................passed And User Verify all fields in group and verify dropdown in Grid view Page...passed
